name: Effigy (mich1)
description:
"What did I do..."

Follow the journey of an unfortunate soul lost in a seemingly endless maze. As you search for a way out, you remember why you're there.... and you may no longer want to leave.

CONTROLS

WASD  - Move

Shift      -  Run

Mouse -  Camera

CREDITS
